revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Linksys WAP610N.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-N Access Point with Dual-Band |caption2 = |pp = |sp = https://www.linksys.com/us/support-product/?pid=01t80000003KO7WAAW |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Linksys |model = WAP610N |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |type = access point |sernum = PUU0 |fcc_id = Q87-WAP610N |icid = 3839A-WAP610N |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CNS1101;CAVIUM NETWORKS, Star(TM),CNS1101M-250, CNS1101M-25FP208-AD00-G, 217HLNJ3.1a, D0922-G, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM FA526 |cpu1_type_rev = ECONA |cpu1spd = 200 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Eon;EN29LV320AB-70TCP; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5DU561622ETP-5; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:23:69, 00:25:9C, 68:7F:74, 98:FC:11 |oui = 00:23:69, 00:25:9C, 68:7F:74, 98:FC:11 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.16-star;; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Richwave;RTC6673;886, 6673, A816;2;;24-pin QFN;4 mm x 4 mm; |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = linksys |defaultssid_regex = ^linksys$ |default_ch = |manuf = U-MEDIA |manuf_model = WAP-703S |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/13/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 745883587995 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B002LITFTG |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Metalink;MtW8171;MtW8171LB-B0G, TA-P918B9500P, 0918; |rad1chip2 = Metalink;MtW8151;MtW8151QF-D1, JA-P81008948P, 0810; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== WAP610N serial numbers appear to start with '''PUU0'''. The same basic hardware is used by the [[Linksys WET610N]]. The PCI ID of the on-board MtW8171 is '''1a30:0680''', which is identified as
the ''Hyperion II'' (2nd-gen MTLK chipset) from the '''Wave300''' driver source. If unable to get an IP via DHCP the router MAY assume the IP of 169.254.1.226
(it's in the FCC submitted manual.. but not the one from the Linksys support site). The included power adapter is a '''Bestec''' EA0121WAA (12V, 1A). :ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ===Noted units=== *"0500-1140751000" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"081R-WST703SN01 R05" and "MP080195000112" is printed on a label affixed to the board :in the FCC photos, seeming to indicate the device was a '''U-MEDIA''' WST-703S. :The CPU is as a [[Star]] STR9101. *"0500-2240751200" is silkscreened on production model board. :"081R-WAP703SN00 R02" and "MM 090175900909" is printed on a label affixed :to the board, seeming to indicate this device is a '''U-MEDIA''' WAP-703S. :The CPU is a [[Cavium]] Networks CNS1101M-25FP208-AD00-G, :which is a new '''Cavium''' P/N for the [[Star]] STR9101. :([http://www.siliconsemiconductor.net/article/70973-Cavium-Networks-to-acquire-Taiwan-based-Star-Semiconductor.php '''Cavium''' acquired '''Star Semiconductor''' in 2008]) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31555-cisco-linksys-wes610n-dual-band-n-entertainment-bridge-with-4-port-switch-reviewed Review for the ''Cisco-Linksys WES610N'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *:[http://support.linksys.com/en-us/gplcodecenter/ GPL code is avaiable @ '''Linksys''''s ''GPL Code Center''] and [http://download.modem-help.co.uk/mfcs-L/LinkSys/WAP610N/GPL/r1-0-00-b832/ mirrored @ '''modem-help.co.uk'''] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
(RxD)
(TxD)
(GND)
[3.3]
====Login credentials==== Per the GPL code dump for the WAP610N, the relevant line on /etc/shadow is :'''root:$1$ZAwqf2dI$ZukbihyQtUghNDsLAQaP31:10933:0:99999:7:::''', :[http://threatpost.com/critical-remote-flaw-found-linksys-wireless-access-point-021011/74926 indicating a password of '''wlan''' for the root user]. {{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
